name: cake time - a persona 5 poopiepost visual novel
name_original: cake time - a persona 5 poopiepost visual novel
description:
you and goro akechi end up as sanrioesque characters! a really quick visual novel-type made for the lols

~

After unzipping, click the game.exe (Windows) or game.app (Mac OS X) to launch!

Due the developer identity, the MAC OS X version may need you to allow access to run the game.

You can do so by initially launching the game (do not throw to trash if prompted) , then go to your System Preferences > Security & Privacy, it should have an option to unlock and launch the game :^D
